results.title: Current Status of Chemoprevention in Barrett's Esophagus.
results.text_hl: Candidates for chemoprevention in @<m>DISEASE_Barrett_Esophagus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001471 @@@Barrett's esophagus@@@ have long been suggested and there has been observational data to support many drugs, including statins, hormone replacement therapy, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, proton pump inhibitor therapy, and @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@.

citations.NLM: Moayyedi P, El-Serag HB. Current Status of Chemoprevention in Barrett's Esophagus. Gastrointest Endosc Clin N Am. 2021 Jan;31(1):117-130. PMID: 33213791
citations.BibTeX: @article{33213791, title={Current Status of Chemoprevention in Barrett's Esophagus.}, author={Moayyedi P and El-Serag HB}, journal={Gastrointest Endosc Clin N Am}, volume={31}, number={1}, pages={117-130}}

results.title: Dynamic switch of immunity and antitumor effects of metformin in rat spontaneous esophageal carcinogenesis

results.title: Association of Common Use Pharmaceuticals in Reducing Risk of Esophageal Adenocarcinoma: A SEER-Medicare Analysis.
results.text_hl: Use of PPIs alone and with NSAIDs, statins, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with reduced risk of @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000230 @@@EAC@@@; however, a history of @<m>DISEASE_Barrett_Esophagus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001471 @@@BE@@@ may diminish drug efficacy.

citations.NLM: Loomans-Kropp HA, Chaloux M, Richmond E, Umar A. Association of Common Use Pharmaceuticals in Reducing Risk of Esophageal Adenocarcinoma: A SEER-Medicare Analysis. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2021 Feb;14(2):195-204. PMID: 32998939

results.title: Intestinal Epithelial AMPK Deficiency Causes Delayed Colonic Epithelial Repair in DSS-Induced Colitis
results.text_hl: We also tested the hypothesis that protection mediated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration on intestinal @<m>DISEASE_Barrett_Esophagus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001471 @@@epithelium damage@@@ required @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation.

citations.NLM: Olivier S, Diounou H, Pochard C, Frechin L, Durieu E, Foretz M, Neunlist M, Rolli-Derkinderen M, Viollet B. Intestinal Epithelial AMPK Deficiency Causes Delayed Colonic Epithelial Repair in DSS-Induced Colitis Cells. 2022 Feb 9;11(4):. PMID: 35203241

results.title: Metformin does not reduce markers of cell proliferation in esophageal tissues of patients with Barrett's esophagus.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ does not reduce markers of cell proliferation in esophageal tissues of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Barrett_Esophagus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001471 @@@Barrett's esophagus@@@.

citations.NLM: Chak A, Buttar NS, Foster NR, Seisler DK, Marcon NE, Schoen R, Cruz-Correa MR, Falk GW, Sharma P, Hur C, Katzka DA, Rodriguez LM, Richmond E, Sharma AN, Smyrk TC, Mandrekar SJ, Limburg PJ, Cancer Prevention Network.
